Title: ImageStone
Description: ImageStone is a powerful C++ class library for image manipulation. Its features include load, save, display, transformation, and nearly 100 special image effects. It can be used cross platform (includes Windows, Linux, Mac), and especially under Windows, it can be used as a DIB wrapper class.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
ImageStone is a powerful C++ class library for image manipulation. Its features include load, save, display, transformation, and nearly 100 special image effects. It can be used cross platform (includes Windows, Linux, Mac), and especially under Windows, it can be used as a DIB wrapper class.
